title: Name of this kind of binding?
content:

hhp

In Europe we call it Schweizer Brochure (Holland) or Schweizer Broschur (Germany) with sewn binding and open back. You can choose the color of the yarn and some binders also can color the glue that is used. I have seen a translation in English where it is called Swiss Brochure.
